name: Black Diaspora Argentina
description:
Black Diaspora Style

A black and white look (with little of red) for Diaspora Argentina and other Diaspora sites. If you want to apply this style to other sites, just use the text-box below and write the address. Also, you can edit the code and add , domain("MY-OTHER-SERVER") at the @-moz-document line.

style_settings.label: Whant another diaspora page? Write it here:
